text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
author: Yogi Berra

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
author: Bernard M. Baruch

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
author: Mae West

text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
author: Bill Keane

text: Don't Gain The World & Lose Your Soul, Wisdom Is Better Than Silver Or Gold.
author: Bob Marley

text: Money and success donâ€™t change people; they merely amplify what is already there
author: Will Smith

text: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
author: Seneca

text: Be the chief but never the lord.
author: Lao Tzu

text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
author: St. Jerome
